Dear Rubab,

 

Thank you for the email.

 

We have registered the claim under reference 23/MO/18373.

 

Please share the following:

*	Damage certificate issued by Emirates
*	Proceed with the unpacking of cartons and take photos of the damaged items
*	Share a detailed claim bill (mentioning the claimed product along with the number of units damaged and its cost)
*	Highlight from commercial invoice the items that are being claimed 

 

Kindly note that the above communication or requirements are not exhaustive. Issued on “without prejudice” basis.

 

Best Regards,
